products.description: Premium Visual Quality - The Acer Nitro 24.5 Gaming Monitor offers a 1920x1080 Full HD resolution, delivering crisp and true-to-life colors. MacBook Air with the M4 chip lets you blaze through work and play. With Apple Intelligence,* up to 18 hours of battery life* and an incredibly portable design, you can take on anything, anywhere.

Purposeful Design. Travel with ease and look great doing it with the Aspire 3 thin, light design. The Aspire 3 is lighter and thinner than ever before at 3.92 pounds and 0.74 inches. Your device stays at your side all day with up to 11 hours of battery life.

Powered by up to AMD Ryzen 7 5700U Octa-core processor, 16GB DDR4 memory and 512GB PCIe NVMe SSD, the Aspire Lite 15 delivers smooth performance for everyday use. Whether you're checking email, editing documents, or catching up on your favorite shows, Aspire Lite 15 handles it all with ease.

Clarity and Comfort: With its narrow bezel design the 15.6 1080p Full HD display is perfect for casual web browsing and watching movies or streaming, allowing for a sharp, detailed view of what's in front of you. And with Acer BluelightShield, lower the levels of blue light to lessen the negative effects of blue light exposure.
